channel.title: Npc's dissapearing
channel.description:
ok when i am owner of the server my npc's will vanish after about 10 minutes i can change my account and they come back but then they dissapear again.
im not sure if its because i am owner or whether they dissapear for normal players aswell
does any-one know whats happening? please help[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2009, 02:33:20 pm[/size][hr]please some-one help?
